Activity: Start the day with a quick meditation session to clear my head. Check emails and prioritize tasks. Listen to a motivational podcast on the commute to work.

Begin preparing materials for initial client presentations. Start by gathering all relevant information about the fund, including its investment strategy, performance history, and risk profile. Time to get creative!

Work with @mkt-1 to develop compelling visuals for the presentation. Choose a color scheme that reflects the fund's brand and create engaging graphics to illustrate key concepts. Aim for 'sleek' and 'trustworthy'.
Lunch at a trendy restaurant with @mkt-1 and @cio-1 to discuss the key messages for the client presentations. Brainstorm ideas for making the presentations more interactive and memorable.

Draft the script for the initial client presentation. Focus on communicating the fund's value proposition in a clear and concise manner. Practice the presentation to ensure a smooth and confident delivery. Need to sound like I know my stuff!
Review the presentation materials with @cio-1 and @ir-1. Incorporate their feedback and make any necessary revisions. Pay attention to their body language to gauge their reaction to the presentation.
Finalize the initial client presentation materials. Save all files in a secure location and back them up to the cloud. Quick update on Facebook before leaving the office.
